roleset.name: Oppose, halt, stop, block up

role.descr: secondary predication, Arg1 stopped from what

roleset.note: Roleset based on verb entry block.01, same as block-n. Framed by Anwen Feb 2011

example.name: Arg1
example.text: Patient Jane has a blockage of at least one of her vessels.
